languages.text: {n}Маражай мрачно кивает.{/n} "Да. И когда мы вернемся... мы поговорим. А теперь... к трофеям".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай мрачно кивает.{/n} "Да. Когда вернемся... мы поговорим. Позже".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай мрачно кивает.{/n} "Да. И когда мы вернемся... мы поговорим. А теперь... к трофеям".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... You and I are going to have a talk. Now let us collect the trophies."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... You and I are going to have a talk. Now let us collect the trophies."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai nickt grimmig.{/n} "In der Tat. Und wenn wir zurück sind ... unterhalten wir beide uns. Doch zuerst ... sammeln wir die Trophäen ein."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai nickt grimmig.{/n} "In der Tat. Und wenn wir zurück sind ... unterhalten wir beide uns. Doch zuerst ... sammeln wir die Trophäen ein."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋严峻地点了点头。{/n}“没错，等我们回去之后……我想和你好好谈谈。至于现在……我们还是先搜刮战利品吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋严峻地点了点头。{/n}“没错，等我们回去之后……我想和你好好谈谈。至于现在……我们还是先搜刮战利品吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai acquiesce, l'air sombre.{/n} « En effet. Et une fois rentrés... vous et moi allons discuter. Mais pour l'heure... récupérons nos trophées. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai acquiesce, l'air sombre.{/n} « En effet. Et une fois rentrés... vous et moi allons discuter. Mais pour l'heure... récupérons nos trophées. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai asiente, lúgubre.{/n} «Efectivamente. Cuando volvamos... hablaremos. Pero, por ahora... recojamos los trofeos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai asiente, lúgubre.{/n} «Efectivamente. Cuando volvamos... hablaremos. Pero, por ahora... recojamos los trofeos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは重々しく頷く。{/n}「その通り。戻ったときに…話がある。だが今は…戦利品を集めるとしよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは重々しく頷く。{/n}「その通り。戻ったときに…話がある。だが今は…戦利品を集めるとしよう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, vahşi bir baş hareketiyle onaylıyor.{/n} "Kesinlikle. Ayrıca geri döndüğümüzde... Konuşmamız gerekecek. Şimdilik ganimetlerimizi toplayalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai nods grimly.{/n} "Indeed. And once we are back... you and I will have a talk. But for now... let us collect the trophies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vahşi bir baş hareketiyle onaylıyor.{/n} "Kesinlikle. Ve geri döndüğümüzde... İkimizin konuşması gerekecek. Ama şimdilik ganimetlerimizi toplayalım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
